item.title: Network Plus Course: Backup and Restore for Network Stability and Resilience
item.category: "IT Certification" , "Networking" , "Network Infrastructure" , "Backup and Restore" , "Disaster Recovery" , "High Availability" , "Data Protection" , "IT Resilience" , "Network Management" , "IT Operations"
item.description: Learn the importance of network device backup and restore, strategies for backing up and restoring device state and configuration, recovery sites, redundancy and high availability mechanisms, and essential metrics in network operations.

item.title: Network Plus Course: Mastering Network Ports and Protocols
item.description: Explore common network ports and protocols, their secure alternatives, and the importance of IP protocol types. Enhance network security and optimize communication.
